attributes.action: People fully vaccinated should not be  required to do PCR Test before travelling
attributes.additional_details: This will allow people to travel without extra burden to pay for PCR Tests. Those who are fully vaccinated are protected. Though, they should be required to use masks on board.
attributes.background: The people who have been fully vaccinated with covid-19 vaccines should not be required to carry out PCR TESTS before travelling. This will encourage people to get vaccinated.
